participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and adventurous, Amina loves to express herself through dance and is always eager to try new things.
participant_1.background: My aunt helped me escape when I was 15 years old. I was born in Somalia. I like to dance. Now I live in the United States.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and creative, Jake enjoys video games and has a playful side that shows in his love for live action roleplaying.
participant_2.background: My favorite band is the Insane Clown Posse. I like donuts. I play a lot of Call of Duty. On weekends I do live action roleplaying events.

content.text: Hey! I'm from Somalia.
Cool! I've never met anyone from Somalia before.
Me neither! I'm the only one from my family who lives in the US.
How did you end up here?
My aunt helped me escape when I was 15 years old.
That's amazing! I'm so glad she was able to help you.
Me too! She's my hero.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to dance! I've been dancing since I was a little girl.
That's awesome! I love dancing too. What kind of dancing do you do?
I do a little bit of everything, but I mostly do hip-hop and contemporary.
Nice! I'm not very good at dancing, but I enjoy it.
It's never too late to learn!
Yeah, I know. I've been thinking about taking some lessons.
You should! It's so much fun.
Maybe I will.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to play video games, watch movies, and read. I also like to go to live action roleplaying events on the weekends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been to a live action roleplaying event before.
They're really fun! You should come with me sometime.
I might! That sounds like a lot of fun.
Great! I'll let you know when I have another one.
Thanks! I appreciate it.
